select u.user_name, u.phonenumber, d.id, d.dept_name, cm.`name` company_name, p.post_name, IFNULL(xiansuo_num, 0) xiansuo_num, IFNULL(customer_num, 0) customer_num, IFNULL(gj_num, 0) gj_num, IFNULL(dandian_contract_num, 0) dandian_contract_num, IFNULL(quyu_contract_num, 0) quyu_contract_num, IFNULL(quyu_dianmian_num, 0) quyu_dianmian_num, IFNULL(dandian_contract_num + quyu_dianmian_num, 0) as dianmian_num from sys_user u left join sys_dept d ON u.dept_id = d.id left JOIN sys_company cm ON cm.id = u.company_id left JOIN sys_user_post up ON up.user_id = u.id left JOIN sys_post p ON p.post_id = up.post_id -- 线索和客户 left JOIN (SELECT c.user_id uid, count(case when c.`status` = 0 then 1 else null end) xiansuo_num, -- 线索状态为0 count(case when c.`status` = 1 then 1 else null end) customer_num -- 客户状态为1 FROM biz_customer c WHERE c.resource <= '6' and c.input_date > #{inputDate} GROUP BY uid ) as xiansuo_num on xiansuo_num.uid = u.id -- 客户跟进 LEFT JOIN (select gj.sys_user_id uid, COUNT(gj.id) as gj_num from biz_genjin gj where 1=1 and gj.genjin_date > #{inputDate} GROUP BY gj.sys_user_id ) as gj_num on gj_num.uid = u.id -- 合同 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT contract.manager_id uid, count(case when contract.produce = 0 then 1 else null end) dandian_contract_num, count(case when contract.produce = 1 then 1 else null end) quyu_contract_num -- COUNT(contract.id) dandian_contract_num FROM biz_contract contract where 1=1 and contract.sign_date > #{inputDate} GROUP BY contract.manager_id ) contract_num ON contract_num.uid = u.id -- 店面 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT dianmian.sys_user_id uid, COUNT(dianmian.id) quyu_dianmian_num FROM biz_dianmian dianmian WHERE dianmian.type = 1 -- 区域加盟 and dianmian.open_date > #{inputDate} GROUP BY dianmian.sys_user_id ) dianmian ON dianmian.uid = u.id
and d.id = #{deptId} and u.id = #{userId}

select u.id, u.user_name, u.phonenumber, dept_id, dept_name, cm.`name` company_name, p.post_name, contract.contract_num, jingying_manager_fee_yingshou, jingying_manager_fee_yishou
from sys_user u left join sys_dept d ON u.dept_id = d.id left JOIN sys_company cm ON cm.id = u.company_id left JOIN sys_user_post up ON up.user_id = u.id left JOIN sys_post p ON p.post_id = up.post_id -- 合同 LEFT JOIN ( select contract.manager_id, contract.num contract_num, contract.fee -> '$.jingyingManagerFee.total' as jingying_manager_fee_yingshou
from biz_contract contract ) contract ON contract.manager_id = u.id -- contract_fee left JOIN ( select fee.contract_num contract_num, SUM(case when fee.type = '经营管理费' then fee.amount else 0 end) jingying_manager_fee_yishou FROM biz_contract_fee fee GROUP BY fee.contract_num ) fee ON fee.contract_num = contract.contract_num -- 查询条件 where d.id = 103 AND u.id = 1
